mixtral-8x7b_direct_sole-planning_result:
Day 1: Minneapolis

* Stay at a child-friendly accommodation in Minneapolis such as the "Radisson Blu Mall of America" or the "Great Wolf Lodge Minnesota". Prices start from $139 per night for a family room, which will cost approximately $580 for 4 nights.
* Visit the Mall of America and the nearby Nickelodeon Universe theme park. Entrance fees are around $40 per person for a full day pass.

Day 2: Travel from Minneapolis to Abilene (via Dallas/Fort Worth)

* Take a flight from Minneapolis to Dallas/Fort Worth, then rent a car and drive to Abilene (approximately 3 hours). Flight prices start from $100 per person, and car rental prices start from $40 per day.
* Stay at the "Sayles Ranch Guesthouse" in Abilene, which has child-friendly accommodations starting from $125 per night, for a total of $250 for 2 nights.

Day 3: Explore Abilene

* Visit the Frontier Texas! museum and the Abilene Zoo, which both offer child-friendly activities. Entrance fees are around $10 per person for each attraction.

Day 4: Travel from Abilene to Amarillo

* Drive from Abilene to Amarillo (approximately 4 hours and 30 minutes). Car rental prices start from $40 per day.
* Stay at the "Big Texan Motel" in Amarillo, which offers child-friendly accommodations starting from $65 per night, for a total of $130 for 2 nights.

Day 5: Explore Amarillo

* Visit the Cadillac Ranch and the American Quarter Horse Hall of Fame & Museum, both of which offer child-friendly activities. Entrance fees are around $5 per person for each attraction.

Day 6: Travel from Amarillo to Lubbock

* Drive from Amarillo to Lubbock (approximately 1 hour and 45 minutes). Car rental prices start from $40 per day.
* Stay at the "Four Points by Sheraton Lubbock Hotel & Conference Center", which has child-friendly accommodations starting from $89 per night, for a total of $178 for 2 nights.

Day 7: Explore Lubbock

* Visit the Science Spectrum Museum and OMNI Theater, which offers child-friendly activities. Entrance fees are around $10 per person.
* Return the rental car in Lubbock before flying back to Minneapolis. Flight prices start from $200 per person.

Total estimated cost: $11,900

Note: The total estimated cost includes accommodation for 7 nights, transportation (flights and car rental), entrance fees for attractions, and a buffer of $1,500 for meals, souvenirs, and other expenses during the trip. Prices are subject to change based on availability and time of booking. It is recommended to book in advance to secure the best deals and avoid any last-minute price increases.
